snippet: Juan Downey, who is getting his first American museum retrospective at the Bronx Museum of the Arts, upended sculptural tradition by examining how humans could affect objects rather than the other way around.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews works by Juan Downey, Invisible Architect, the artist's first American museum retrospective, at the Bronx Museum of the Arts.
lead_paragraph: Juan Downey, who is getting his first American museum retrospective at the Bronx Museum of the Arts, upended sculptural tradition by examining how humans could affect objects rather than the other way around.

headline.seo: ‘Juan Downey: The Invisible Architect’ at Bronx Museum
